msbt.message: It's so sunny and nice out, but my wardrobe is huuuuge and I can't decide what to wear.What do you think will look good on this soon-to-be superstar, ?
Something cute!
Something cool!
Something simple.
Now that is a fab suggestion! I'll def go with a cute look todayjust like every day!
That's a pretty cool idea, going with a "cool" look today!What would look the coolest? Maybe a nice sun hat? You have the best ideas, !
Good call! On a nice sunny day like today, I'm just going to keep it simple!
What kind of music do you listen to on rainy days, ?
Jazz.
Pop.
Classical.
A lot of folks think I'm only into pop since I devote my everything to being a pop star, butI love jazz too! I'm going to put on some jazz music as soon as I get home!

Yes, pop is the ONLY answer! Especially if you're from the future and you've got my fab debut album!Hang on. ARE you from the future?And if you areis my debut album fab?<10_4 /> Or is it just genre defining?I don't care if you're a time traveler, ! I'm so going to listen to pop music all day anyway!
Classical, huh? Yeah, I like the sound of that. Strings, woodwinds, brass, drums, soul-stirring compositions Yeah, I'm going to listen to some classical music as soon as I get home!
Pick one! Sunny days or rainy days? The time has come to choose a side, !
Sunny days.
Rainy days.
Both!

Your choiceIS. SO. RIGHT. I mean, going out on rainy days is fun, but sunny days? They're the best!You know, though, if there's a good show on—hello, BeagleBeats?—then staying in on a sunny day is cool too!

I know, right? Sunny days are fun becausesunlight? But I LOVE the rainy days most of all!I can hang out indoors and listen to the rain while I play video games, or read comics I'm not even kidding. Rainy days are the absolute best!

Can't pick just one? But don't you feel warm and happy when you go outside on a sunny day?Then again, I guess I'm just as happy staying in on a rainy day tooYou might be onto something, . Every kind of day is great!
Tonight, I'm going to relax with a little !Depending on my mood, my post-bath drink changes!
"Tonight's sky" Umm "Tonight's sky totally reflects the depths of my soul Your soul OUR souls"?I'm trying to write lyrics for a song!<10_4 /> It's not as easy as I make it look.

I've decided that, on days when the weather's nice, I'm going to do my dance practice outside!Everyone will see me, and shouldn't all pop stars be seen by everyone?One, two, three, four One, two, three, four Oh yeah! Dancing is the best!

To better enjoy rainy days, I recommend buying a cute outfit!If you have some chic clothes, you can strut around the house on a rainy day feeling fabtastic. I should lay out a runway next time it rains. It'll be a one- fashion show!
Snowflakes are SOOOO sparkly and cute! I wish I could turn them into real accessories.I'd be a famous fashion designer before anyone could learn to pronounce haute couture!
You can't see the stars on rainy nights, but don't worry! Your fave aspiring pop star is right here!
Sunny mornings make me sing! ♪ Sunlight! Shooting FROM THE SKYYY! Making me HAAAPPYYY! ♪
Maybe I'll have lunch outdoors? I found a totally fab spot yesterday! All the cute bugs hang out there!
Hmm, maybe I'll go for a walk with a cup of coffee? That soundsfab.
Spending a lazy day fishing sounds pretty legit right now. I wonder if I have any sunscreenor bait
The light from the moon and stars is so gentle, you know? Like a soft, glowing hug
That's why I'm totally about going for walks at night! Need to get those moon hugs!
Ooh! I should write a song about the moonlight! Gosh, it's weird how nobody's done one of those before
The thing about all this moonlight is, you so have to watch out for all the werefishand vampires!
Want to hear something totes awesome? We might be able to see a meteor shower tonight!The weather is FAB right now, so I'm writing my list of wishes to make once those stars start shooting!
The weather's been perfect-o all day, so we're probs going to see, like, a million shooting stars!I need to plan what order to make my wishes in so I can wish for all the important stuff first.
! OHMIGOSH! LOOK! There's a RAAAAAAINBOW!I was kind of upset about my clothes getting wet earlier, BUT NOW? The rainbow makes it ALL better.

?! CAN YOU EVEN BEEEEEELIEVE IT?! THERE ARE TWO RAINBOWS! <10_4 />TWO!<10_4 /> DEUX! <10_4 />DOS!<10_4 /> ZWEI!If that isn't good luck, I don't know what is! Also? I had no idea I knew how to say "two" in other languages.
Hi, ! It's super nice out, but it's a little cold!Whoa. You think we could maybe see an aurora tonight?<10_4 /> My night walk is going to be FAB!

I've been thinking Aren't auroras basically night rainbows?I think that's a new song I can write!♪ Night rainbows shining in the sky! Night rainbows so aren't shy! Night rainbows watching yooou! ♪Oh yeah. Totes hit material.
UGH! I wore these fab clothes for this walk, but all the fog makes it hard to see me. Boo!

That thunder sounds like the sky is having a pretty weird party.It's probs like, lightning bolts are dancing, then one of them knocks something over andKA<10_10 />BOOM!<10_9 />What a wild show that must be
. Do you see all these stars?! They are SO pretty!I wonder where the bits of fallen stars go? I want to use them to decorate my !
Shooting stars are so glam and mysterious
Did you wish upon a star yet, ?
Yup!
Not yet.
I'm still trying to figure out what I'm going to wish forSince it's a full-on meteor shower, I figure I'll wish the same thing on every falling star.I'm sure to get what I'm after!
Move  and make your best wish. That's all there is to it!
